DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effects on outcome of levosimendan with respect to timing of its administration on the postoperative course of high-risk cardiac surgery patients in a retrospective observational study.
DOC.brief_title: Levosimendan Administration and Outcome in Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing cardiac surgery between 2006 and 2013 levosimendan administration within 24 hours of postoperative ICU admission patients younger than 18
